panels.description:
Database of this cluster ${cls}

Load: active_time / backends (PG14 only)

Query RT : max query rt of this database

Client: Pgbouncer Active Clients

Server: Pgbouncer Active Servers

Backend: Postgres num backends

T = is Template?

D = Disabled in Pgbouncer ?

P = Paused in Pgbouncer ?
panels.title: Database

panels.description: Tuples fetched, inserted, updated, delete among this cluster
panels.title: Row Modified (rate5m)

panels.description: Database 4k blocks hit ratio in last 1 minute
panels.title: Blocks Hit Ratio (1m)

targets.expr:
max by (relname) (pg_table_n_dead_tup{ins="$primary", datname="$datname"} / 
(pg_table_n_live_tup{ins="$primary", datname="$datname"} + pg_table_n_dead_tup{ins="$primary", datname="$datname"}))

panels.description:
Index Scan + Seq Scan on this table per second.

Size by table size, Color by table scan rate.
panels.title: Table Size & Access

panels.description: Index Scan + Seq Scan on this table per second
panels.title: Table Scan (scan/s)

panels.description:
`pg_stat_statements` metrics of database ${datname} in this cluster: ${cls}.

Click the `Instance` Column will goes to PGSQL Database Dashboard.
panels.title: Statements

panels.description:
Area represent time spent in last 1h
color represent RT of this query

targets.rawSql:
SELECT queryid::TEXT AS query, sum(total_exec_time) AS time_spent, sum(calls) AS calls, 
       sum(total_exec_time) / sum(calls) AS rt 
FROM
(SELECT queryid, total_exec_time, calls FROM pg_stat_statements s ORDER BY rows DESC LIMIT 200) raw
WHERE calls > 0
GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT queryid::TEXT AS query, sum(total_exec_time) AS time_spent, sum(calls) AS calls, 
       sum(total_exec_time) / sum(calls) AS rt 
FROM
(SELECT queryid, total_exec_time, calls FROM pg_stat_statements s ORDER BY rows DESC LIMIT 200) raw
WHERE calls > 0
GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC;

panels.title: Query Time Spent & RT

panels.description: `dM/dt`, where `M` is `calls`, which is queries per second, in last minute
panels.title: Query QPS (1m)

panels.description: dM/dC, where M is total_exec_time and C is calls, which means query latency in last 1 minute
panels.title: Query RT (1m)

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cls
